entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early in the morning then becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
